fields.name: Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments

fields.name: DisplayText1
fields.fieldText:
Machine should be greased daily & must be loaded with blade facing forward.

Ensure Track Lock Bars are secured in place and the ditching bucket is within front frame work and the slew lock is in place before moving the machine.

If any of the above FAIL - the digger/trailer is not to be used. Notify your line manager and report to WHC on: 01684 377977.

fields.name: DisplayText2
fields.fieldText: Document to be filled in at the start of every shift and signed and returned to the line manager on a weekly basis

fields.name: StandardMessage
fields.fieldText: Please go to Quick Actions menu and generate a Service Report for this form immediately, thank you.

fields.name: FinalScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText: This is the final screen, clicking 'Next' will exit the form.
